title: Outbound visitor growth in Africa 2018 to 2022
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Year-over-year visitor growth, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2020 to 2018.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2022 to 2021.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2021 to 2020.
gold: This statistic shows outbound visitor growth in Africa from 2018 to 2022 . In 2018 , outbound visitor numbers from Africa grew by 6.1 percent over the previous year . The visitor number was forecast to grow by approximately four percent in 2022 .
